com.glmapview

Interface GLMapImageGroupCallback


  • public interface GLMapImageGroupCallback

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getImageIndex(int i)
      Method must return variant of image to use
      MapPoint getImagePos(int i)
      Method must return location of image on map
      int getImagesCount()
      Method must return total number of images that will be displayed by image group
      android.graphics.Bitmap getImageVariantBitmap(int i)
      Method must return bitmap to use for given variant of image
      MapPoint getImageVariantOffset(int i)
      Method must return offset to use for given variant of image
      int getImageVariantsCount()
      Method must return number of unique images that will be used by image group
      void updateFinished()
      Method called when update finished.
      void updateStarted()
      Method called when update started.

    • Method Detail

      • getImageVariantsCount

        int getImageVariantsCount()
        Method must return number of unique images that will be used by image group
        Returns:
        number of unique images

      • getImageVariantBitmap

        android.graphics.Bitmap getImageVariantBitmap(int i)
        Method must return bitmap to use for given variant of image
        Parameters:
        i - index of image variant (0 .. variantsCount-1)
        Returns:
        bitmap to use for given variant of image

      • getImageVariantOffset

        MapPoint getImageVariantOffset(int i)
        Method must return offset to use for given variant of image
        Parameters:
        i - index of image variant (0 .. variantsCount-1)
        Returns:
        offset for bitmap in pixels

      • getImagesCount

        int getImagesCount()
        Method must return total number of images that will be displayed by image group
        Returns:
        number of images

      • getImageIndex

        int getImageIndex(int i)
        Method must return variant of image to use
        Parameters:
        i - index of image (0 .. imagesCount-1)
        Returns:
        index of image variant to use (0 .. variantsCount-1)

      • getImagePos

        MapPoint getImagePos(int i)
        Method must return location of image on map
        Parameters:
        i - index of image (0 .. imagesCount-1)
        Returns:
        point on map in internal format of GLMapView

      • updateStarted

        void updateStarted()
        Method called when update started. Lock data until updateFinished is called. Update can start when big changes of zoom happened.

      • updateFinished

        void updateFinished()
        Method called when update finished.
